Title: The Chinese Dream, my dream
Notes: The figurine, colloquially called Meng wawa (梦娃娃), or Baby Wang, played a major role in propaganda clips on television.This poster is not in our collection. The image shown has been downloaded from http://www.wenming.cn/jwmsxf_294/zggygg/pml/zgmxl/201309/t20130930_1501… (11 September 2021).
